name: WhatsAppHack
short_description:
Insert a USB into your phone and mount the SDCard and.....boom, its done! The back up for your WhatsApp media is done!
WhatsAppHack is a simple linux python-based program that automates WhatsApp media backup on linux. Its extremely simple to use as the only thing you have to do (after installing it) is sit back and relax! Yes, you dont even have to run it after installation! it will start itself after you login and it will do its work without you having to intervene! Be sure to read the README file that comes with this download ZIP file though
summary: Get your whatsapp media automatically to your PC
